title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
### Dive into Elegance with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch

**Style Number: 98B406**

The Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch is more than just a timepiece; it's a statement of sophistication and adventure. This watch combines the timeless elegance of gold with the rugged functionality of a high-performance chronograph, making it the perfect companion for both formal occasions and thrilling expeditions.

#### **Key Features:**

- **Stunning Design:**
  - **Gold-Tone Stainless Steel Case:** A luxurious gold-tone finish on the stainless steel case adds a touch of elegance to any outfit.
  - **Black Unidirectional Timing Bezel with Gold-Tone Accents:** The bezel is not only stylish but also functional, allowing you to track elapsed time with precision.
  - **Domed Mineral Crystal:** The domed mineral crystal provides durability and a clear view of the dial, even in challenging conditions.

- **Dial and Luminescence:**
  - **Black Sunburst Dial:** The black sunburst dial is a visual masterpiece, featuring gold-tone and silver-tone accents that catch the light and add depth.
  - **Luminescent Hands and Markers:** Whether you're diving deep or navigating through the night, the luminescent hands and markers ensure that you can read the time in any lighting condition.

- **Advanced Functions:**
  - **Chronograph:** Track time with precision using the chronograph function, perfect for timing events or workouts.
  - **24-Hour Display:** Stay in sync with different time zones around the world with the 24-hour display.
  - **Calendar Display:** Never miss an important date with the calendar display that shows the day and date.

- **Rugged and Stylish:**
  - **Water Resistance:** With a water resistance of 100 meters, this watch is ready for any aquatic adventure.
  - **Gold-Tone Stainless Steel Bracelet:** The bracelet features curved and faceted links that are both comfortable and stylish, secured with a sport foldover closure for a secure fit.

#### **Why Choose the Bulova Marine Star 98B406?**

- **Versatility:** Whether you're dressing up for a business meeting or gearing up for a weekend getaway, the Marine Star 98B406 adapts to your lifestyle.
- **Durability:** Built to last, this watch is crafted from high-quality materials that stand the test of time.
- **Precision:** Accurate timekeeping and reliable functions make this watch a trusted companion in any situation.

### **Elevate Your Style with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch**

Experience the perfect blend of luxury and functionality with the Bulova Men's Marine Star 98B406. This watch is not just a fashion accessory; it's a statement of your adventurous spirit and refined taste. Add it to your collection today and step into a world of timeless elegance and modern performance.

**Order Now and Dive into a New Level of Style and Functionality!**
